issue.title: [Go] Add initial support for s390x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9803](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9803). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the unit tests in go/arrow are failing on s390x.  I'd like to add initial support for s390x which allow the tests to pass.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9803?focusedCommentId=17230216) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8011
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8011>
